com.android.frameworks.downloadmanagertests

Class DownloadManagerTestApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • android.test.InstrumentationTestCase
        • com.android.frameworks.downloadmanagertests.DownloadManagerBaseTest
          • com.android.frameworks.downloadmanagertests.DownloadManagerTestApp

  • public class DownloadManagerTestApp
extends DownloadManagerBaseTest
    Class to test downloading files from a real (not mock) external server.

      • normalizeUri

        public java.lang.String normalizeUri(java.lang.String uri)
        Normalizes a uri to ensure it ends with a "/"
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to normalize (or null)
        Returns:
        The normalized uri, or null if null was passed in

      • getDownloadStartedFilePath

        protected java.lang.String getDownloadStartedFilePath()
        Gets the path to the file that flags that a download has started. The file contains the DownloadManager id of the download being trackted between reboot sessions.
        Returns:
        The path of the file tracking that a download has started
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted
        java.lang.Exception - if timed out while waiting for SD card to mount

      • doCommonDownloadSetup

        protected void doCommonDownloadSetup()
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Common setup steps for downloads. Note that these are not included in setUp, so that individual tests can control their own state between reboots, etc.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • initiateDownload

        public void initiateDownload()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Initiates a download. Queues up a download to the download manager, and saves the DownloadManager's assigned download ID for this download to a file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if unsuccessful

      • verifyFileDownloadSucceeded

        public void verifyFileDownloadSucceeded()
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Waits for a previously-initiated download and verifies it has completed successfully.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if unsuccessful

      • runLargeDownloadOverWiFi

        public void runLargeDownloadOverWiFi()
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Tests downloading a large file over WiFi (~10 Mb).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if unsuccessful

      • runDownloadMultipleSwitching

        public void runDownloadMultipleSwitching()
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Tests that downloads resume when switching back and forth from having connectivity to having no connectivity using both WiFi and airplane mode. Note: Device has no mobile access when running this test.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if unsuccessful

      • runDownloadMultipleWiFiEnableDisable

        public void runDownloadMultipleWiFiEnableDisable()
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Tests that downloads resume when switching on/off WiFi at various intervals. Note: Device has no mobile access when running this test.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if unsuccessful

      • runDownloadMultipleAirplaneModeEnableDisable

        public void runDownloadMultipleAirplaneModeEnableDisable()
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Tests that downloads resume when switching on/off Airplane mode numerous times at various intervals. Note: Device has no mobile access when running this test.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if unsuccessful

      • runDownloadMultipleSimultaneously

        public void runDownloadMultipleSimultaneously()
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Tests 15 concurrent downloads of 1,000,000-byte files.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if test failed
